summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 26, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms, which are routine prison population tracking documents. The most significant detail is the inclusion of Jeffrey Epstein (REG NO 76318-054) on an inmate roster for an attorney visit, placing him at the MCC on the date of his death.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with registration number 76318-054 for an attorney visit assignment on July 26, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative counts and tracking of inmate population and assignments at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, with inmate registration number 76318-054, is listed on a prison roster dated July 26, 2019.
The documents are from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Epstein was held.
The date on all forms is July 26, 2019, the day Epstein was found dead in his cell.
One form specifically lists Epstein for an 'ATTY' (attorney) assignment, indicating a scheduled legal visit.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative records for tracking inmate counts and movements.
